title: My chilli con carne
ingredients: ['3 onions, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon chilli powder', 'salt and ground black pepper', '600g minced beef', '300g passata', '2 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes', '1 cinnamon stick', '2 (400g) tins red kidney beans, drained']
